column4: after "sudo apt-get install gnome" I got "E: Couldn't find package gnome"
maybe I missed out on exactly what it is you are trying to accomplish
I just installed ubuntu and after the first login it justs sits there - just the mouse and the ubuntu-earthy-brown desktop. no Icons, no menus, no trays, nothing but mouse and brown.
have you tried failsafe gnome or any of the other options under the gdm sessions menu?
you get the gdm login dont you?
